content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. What’s your name so I can better assist you?
Hi John! Can I have the address where you’d like us to provide service?
Sorry, I’m just really busy this month. I don’t think I can schedule anything right now.
No problem, John! If your schedule opens up or if you need help in the future, feel free to reach out. We’re here whenever you’re ready. Have a great day!
reason: Customer is too busy to schedule this month
